name: ONZE-Miner
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: ONZE Miner is a browser-based linguistics research tool that stores audio recordings and regular-expression searchable text transcripts of interviews.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:© 2004-20[\d]{2} <a href="http:\/\/www\.ling\.canterbury\.ac\.nz\/" target="onze">ONZE Project<\/a> University of Canterbury, NZ)

matches.text: ONZE Miner is free software distributed under the terms of the GNU General Public License
